title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
subject: Data Science
theory: EDA is the detective work phase. You look at distributions (histograms), relationships (scatter plots), and correlations to understand the physics of your data before modeling.

interview_questions.question: What are you looking for in EDA?
interview_questions.answer: Outliers, Missing values, Distributions (Normal?), and Correlations between features.

summary: EDA generates the hypotheses that you later test.
